# Enforce database enum values to follow the configured style (`@v2nic/prisma/db-enum-value-style`)

ðŸ’¡ This rule is manually fixable by [editor suggestions](https://eslint.org/docs/latest/use/core-concepts#rule-suggestions).

## Options

<!-- begin auto-generated rule options list -->

| Name    | Description                                                                             | Type   | Default      |
| :------ | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :----- | :----------- |
| `style` | Case-insensitive. Accepts snake_case, camel_case, pascal_case, or screaming_snake_case. | String | `snake_case` |
